description.value: At 20th level, when entering a bloodrage, you become immune to charm effects and all forms of mind reading, you gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against other mind-affecting effects, you gain the effects of the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{See Invisibility}, and you can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.xllxylvvqr82o2d5]{Detect Thoughts} at will.
